name: Handcent Next SMS (Best texting with MMS,stickers)
description: Handcent Next SMS 8.0 has arrived, bringing to you all kinds of new features, visual and stability improvements. The best replacement android text messaging app for your stock SMS text messenger app. The best message app on the market with free text message, message sticker. - Best SMS app with ultimate customization  - Tons of handy features to make your life easier - Group text to send messages to multiple recipient  - Cloud back-up, never worry about long texts ever again - Texting from computer   - Reliable guard to keep texts safe and secure - Wear OS support, receive and reply texts from your android wear device  Starting in 2010, Handcent is not only the pioneer but also the ultimate message customizer in all SMS messaging app: giving user great free texting experience is our top priority.    Ultimate Customization Gorgeous themes and backgrounds, everything can be changed to your liking in our texting app. Its the most popular message customizer, you can personalize text messages (free mms), bubble style, fonts, color, ringtone, LED color, vibration pattern, etc. Theme store now offers more wallpaper and bubbles for you to choose from. With new 8.0, we also more free-style font personalization with support for more areas, all new night mode, and pop-up window and etc.    Handcent Anywhere Best texting companion on computer and tablet.  With Handcent Anywhere you will be able to send text messages from your PC, Mac, or Tablet without touching your Android phone texting app. It can come in handy in office or home settings where you can simply focus on the computer screen without worrying about missing a text. Go to aw.handcent.com and start chatting.  MMS plus  Share full-size multimedia(pics, audio, video) messages with your friends. MMS plus can act as a multimedia android text messaging downloader, save the multimedia files on our cloud server. (Itll open in the browser if not installed). With 8.0 version, you will also be able to compress video.  Pop up Quick reply messages with pop up window, it can even show over lock screen. Handcent Next SMS text messenger app now has new look and functionality, try it to explore more.   Private Box Your own personal space, a totally encrypted message box that can only be opened by a unique passcode set by you. Best way to protect your privacy.  SMS Backup Never worry about losing your texts with our newest backup service. Easily restore all your messages (SMS / MMS), settings and scheduled task when you switch to a new phone or factory reset your phone.  Wear OS support Support for receiving and replying messages on all your android-based smartwatch, along with the features like quick replyvoice reply(voice to text) and so on  Search You can now search within the conversation. You can also search text messages by time, message type and etc.    SMS Blocker/Blacklisting Block all unwanted or spam SMS messages in our android text messaging app.  Scheduled Task Schedule texts to be sent at a given time. Its useful when you need to remind others or yourself at a particular time.   Emoji Have more fun with your friends in the best customizable texting app. Now even with the fun emojis and animated ones.  Plus the latest 1600+ emojis including all sorts of diversities and skin tone, also complies with the newest emoji standard in a sms messenger!  Stickers Now integrated with Giphy. You can now send the popular, trending or whatever stickers you can think of by doing a quick search. Handcent is the best sms messenger with stickers.  Sticky on top Handcent Next SMS sms messenger pins your favorite contacts on top based on your need.   Globalization Support for multiple languages to send sms messages.   Underneath theres a ton of improvements to improve the speed, stability and battery usage.   Other features include: Group Messaging Chat, Bulk SMS, text snippets and etc.  For those of you who are willing to help us translate the app, please contact us at help@handcent.com
